name: Attack and Dethrone God, a tea-drinker's perspective
name_original: Attack and Dethrone God, a tea-drinker's perspective
description:
A very short game on the theme of Attack and Dethrone God. Made for the Game Jam of the same name. https://itch.io/jam/dethrone-god-jam

This literally took me 20 mins so please be kind. :)

You can see my stuff at https://www.liedra.net and listen to me talk about ethics and games at https://www.notjustagame.eu
